document_data.name: Ransaran
document_data.mainbody: '''Ransaran''' was a skill weaponsmith inhabiting the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Ransaran's shop, which was called [[Ransaran's Sergeant-at-Arms]], was located in central Daggerford along [[Duke's Way]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}} Ransaran charged steep prices for his weaponry, but given the exceptional quality of the weapons, most customers considered this to be more than fair.
document_data.Relationships: He was close friends with the [[gnome]] [[Archiloque]]. Ransaran crafted a special set of [[short sword]]s for Archiloque that included a series of straps and safety catches, allowing his friend to effectively wield the weapons with his arthritic hands.
